meta.name: description
meta.content: Canyons School District covers roughly 192 square miles in the southeast part of the Salt Lake Valley, and serves approximately 33,000 students in 29 elementary schools, eight middle schools, four high schools and four special programs. Canyons School District comprises the cities of Cottonwood Heights, Draper, Midvale, Sandy and the town of Alta. Canyons District focuses on four major tenets: student achievement, innovation, community engagement and customer service. Administration, teachers, and staff have the primary goal to get students prepared for college and careers.
meta.title: Canyons School District, Sandy UT 84093, 801-826-5000

img.alt: We are new to the District. How can I register my child for school?
We are new to the District. How can I register my child for school?

h4.a: We are new to the District. How can I register my child for school?

div.p: Students who are new to Canyons District, and need to enroll in classes now, should contact their boundary school where staff can assist them in completing the necessary paperwork. You can locate your boundary school at this link: https://www.canyonsdistrict.org/bus-locator. Students planning to enroll in Canyons for the first time this coming fall will be able to register online. CSD’s online registration window for new and returning students typically opens in early August. Stay tuned for more information.
